Package com.madrobot.di.json

JSON serializer/deserializer

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JSONDeserializer
    Utility class for json deserializer , by using this utility you can convert json into predefined java object
    JSONSerializer
    Utility class for json serializer , by using this utility you can convert predefined java object into valid json

Package com.madrobot.di.json Description

JSON serializer/deserializer

The name of the java bean has to be the same as declared in the JSON object. If the name is different we use the @SerializedName annotation. Eg: @SerializedName("my name")


Customization of the json's array size is also possible using the @ItemType annotation. Eg: @ItemType(size=10). This helps when we need to restrict the number of array elements to be deserialized.


Serialization 
 
                String jsonContent =
                JSONSerializer.getInstance().serializer([json content]);

DeSerialization 
                Object obj = JSONDeserializer.getInstance().deserialize(
